date.title: The date on which the activity occurred or on which the transaction associated with the activity settled.

net_amount.title: The net amount of money (positive or negative) associated with the activity.

symbol.title: The symbol of the security involved with the activity. Not present for all activity types.

qty.title: For dividend activities, the number of shares that contributed to the payment. Not present for other activity types.

per_share_amount.title: For dividend activities, the average amount paid per share. Not present for other activity types.

description.title: Description field for transaction records (TRANS, CSR, CSD).
